borehole.gui

Class TCP

  • java.lang.Object
    • borehole.gui.TCP
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class TCP
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Client class that handles the connection to the server, retrieves the data stream and send commands to the server

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TCP(Data data) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void connect(java.lang.String IP)
      Connects the client to the server through a socket and saves the IP and port to the global variables IP and port
      void disconnect()
      Closes the socket if the client is already connected
      boolean isConnected()
      Returns the status of connection socket
      void receiveData()
      Retrieves the byte array containing sensor data from the camera module and updates these values in the data storage.
      void run() 
      void sendData()
      Send command data to server and stopindicator.

    • Method Detail

      • connect

        public void connect(java.lang.String IP)
             throws java.io.IOException
        Connects the client to the server through a socket and saves the IP and port to the global variables IP and port
        Parameters:
        IP - IP of the server to connect to
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Throws an IOException when the connection is unsuccessful

      • receiveData

        public void receiveData()
                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Retrieves the byte array containing sensor data from the camera module and updates these values in the data storage.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Throws exception if header is invalid or data is null

      • sendData

        public void sendData()
              throws java.io.IOException
        Send command data to server and stopindicator. TODO add servoaxis
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • isConnected

        public boolean isConnected()
        Returns the status of connection socket
        Returns:
        The connection status of the socket

      • disconnect

        public void disconnect()
                throws java.io.IOException
        Closes the socket if the client is already connected
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Throws IOException if there is a problem connecting
